question: how to divorce?
answer:
QUESTION
My wife wants me to give her a divorce due to irreconcilable differences We have a 3 year old daughter. Please advice on how to divorce correctly according to Shariah.
ANSWER


Share:
We would advise you to go to the nearest branch of the Jamiatul Ulama and have them handle the case. If you are set on divorcing her, then too after discussion with them, only grant her one divorce, not more.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Husain Kadodia
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED & APPROVED: Mufti Imraan Vawda
